flavor_text: Each and every time it inhales and exhales hotembers dribble out of its mouth and nostrils.
It is found in volcanic craters. Its body temp. isover 1100 degrees so don't under estimate it.
It naturally spits an 1100-degree flame. It is saidwhen many appear it heralds a volcanic eruption.

MAGBY's state of health is determined by observing the fire it breathes. If the Pokemon is spouting yellowflames from its mouth it is in good health. When it is fatigued black smoke will be mixed in with the flames.
